function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The deployment of anti-contagion policies significantly slowed the pandemic.","Impact":"Reduction in pandemic spread.","Mitigation":"Continue and enforce anti-contagion policies.","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing, vaccine distribution, quarantine monitoring.","People":"General population, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations.","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, healthcare institutions."},{"Description":"Persistent reductions in growth rates have a compounding effect on infections.","Impact":"Continued reduction in pandemic spread.","Mitigation":"Sustained enforcement of anti-contagion policies and public health measures.","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing, vaccine distribution, quarantine monitoring.","People":"General population, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations.","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, healthcare institutions."},{"Description":"The number of COVID-19 infections depends on the growth rate of infections on all previous days.","Impact":"Continued impact on pandemic spread.","Mitigation":"Continued monitoring of growth rates, enforcement of anti-contagion policies, vaccination programs.","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing, vaccine distribution, data analytics.","People":"General population, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations.","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, healthcare institutions."}]}
